content: in this legal case the court in torino issued a final resolution involving two parties referred to as le vi and le gi eu ro the court determined that le vi is owed a sum of eur 378093 by le gi eu ro and le gi eu ro is owed a sum of eur 440958 by le vi as a result le vi must pay le gi eu ro a sum of eur 62865 the court also ordered the dissolution of their shared property and the division of assets through drawing lots the case originated from a dispute between le gi eu ro and co gi ro over their deceased fathers estate the court found that le gi eu ros actions contributed to the failure of a private contract and caused damage to the estate the court dismissed le vis claim for damages and ordered le gi eu ro to reimburse le vi for expenses incurred the court addressed the issue of joint liability and determined the division of assets based on the preferences value and condition of the assets some adjustments were made to the division plan due to technical issues and discrepancies in property records overall the court resolved the issues and ordered both parties to comply with the final resolution the decision was made in turin on may 26 2021
